meanings: 작동[가동]하기 시작하다, 효력을 보이기 시작하다 (=come into force)

vlive.korean: [간단한 타이머 조작으로 강력한 피부 케어를!] [Powerful skin care with simple timer operation!] View video Hyomstore : ep.19 우리 회사에 있는 제품을 공개합니다
vlive.english: [Powerful skin care with simple timer operation!]

vlive.korean: 야 유나영 정상작동! Yoo Nayoung, normal operation. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MAMAMOO] 오늘도 사이좋은 용쾅별쾅에 내 심장 정..상..작..동..! (Solar&Moon Byul acting ’Start love’)
맞아 - 작전 회의? - 연락을... Right. - Operation meeting? - We contacted... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 🍊Happy SeungKwan Day🍊
그렇지, 엘리베이터 그러니까... - 엘리베이터? Right. An elevator in operation. - Elevator? 듣기 View video NCT : 런찬파티💚💚💚
vlive.english: Right. An elevator in operation. - Elevator?

vlive.korean: [작전 개시] - 통화라도 한번 시켜줄까? - 우와! [Operation begins] - I can put you on the phone with them. - Whoa! 듣기 View video Dingo Freestyle / 딩고프리스타일 : [DAMOIM/★선공개★] EP.6 다모임 안의 중2병이 깨어났다…!ㅣ둘도 없는 힙합 친구 : 다모임ㅣDingo Freestyle
vlive.english: [Operation begins] - I can put you on the phone with them. - Whoa!

examples.korean: She is convalescing at home after her operation. 발음듣기 그녀는 수술을 받은 후 집에서 요양 중이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is convalescing at home after her operation. 발음

examples.korean: The delicate surgical operation took five hours. 발음듣기 그 까다로운 외과 수술은 다섯 시간이 걸렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The delicate surgical operation took five hours. 발음

examples.korean: He never really rallied after the operation. 발음듣기 그는 그 수술 후에 결코 진정으로 회복되지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He never really rallied after the operation. 발음

examples.korean: She accepted the prospect of her operation with equanimity. 발음듣기 그녀는 수술을 해야 할 가능성을 침착하게 받아들였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She accepted the prospect of her operation with equanimity. 발음

examples.korean: The police operation was encumbered by crowds of reporters. 발음듣기 경찰의 작전은 몰려든 기자들 때문에 지장을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The police operation was encumbered by crowds of reporters. 발음
